comments: Being a subset of A141158, this is also a subset of the primes of form x^2-5*y^2. - _Tito Piezas III_, Dec 28 2008Apparently primes p such that 5 | tau(p), where Ramanujan's tau is A000594. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 08 2013
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [ p: p in PrimesUpTo(1300) | p mod 5 in {0, 4} ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 13 2012(PARI) is(n)=n==5 || (n%5==4 && isprime(n)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 08 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
